萐萐萐

萐字的基本解释

萐
shà
〔萐莆（
f?）〕古书上说的一种植物，叶大可做扇。

萐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shà］
［《廣韻》山洽切，入洽，生。］
［《廣韻》山輒切，入葉，生。］
(1)传说中的瑞草名。
(2)扇的别名。

萐字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　萐； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1041第12
【唐韻】山洽切【集韻】色輒切【韻會】山輒切，?音歃。萐蒲，瑞草。王者孝德至，則萐蒲生於厨。【白虎通】阜出萐莆。萐莆，樹名，其葉大於門扇，不搖自扇，於飮食淸涼，助供養也。　又【集韻】實洽切，音䮜。義同。

考證：〔【白虎通】阜出萐莆。【註】萐莆，樹，其葉大於門扇〕　謹按原文萐莆樹以下係白虎通正文非註文。謹將註萐莆樹四字改萐莆樹名。
萐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
萐字的起名意思

传说中的瑞草名；扇的别名。

萐
Basic explanation of words
萐
shà
〔萐莆(
f?)] One of the plants mentioned in ancient books, Yeda can be used as a fan.
萐
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shà］
["Guang Yun" Shan Qiaqi, enter Qia, and be born. ]
["Guangyun" Shan Noir is cut into leaves, raw. ]
(1) The legendary name of Seocho.
(2) The alias of the fan.
萐
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　萐; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 1041 to 12
[Tang Yun] Mountain Qiaqie [Jiyun] Color and color cut [Rhyme] Mountain Qiaqie, sound shame. Philip, Seocho. The king is filial, and Qiupu was born in the kitchen. 【Baihutong】Fu out of qipu. Zipu, the name of the tree, its leaves are larger than the door leaf, and it does not sway from the door.　[Jiyun] Really consistent and sound. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Baihutong] Fu out of Qipu. [Note] Qipu, a tree, its leaves are larger than the door leaf] 　 I would like to follow the original text of the Baihutong text without annotated text below the Qipu tree. I would like to change the four-character 萐莆树 into the name of the 萐莆 tree.
萐
Source glyph

Name meaning
The legendary name of Seocho; the alias of fan.
shà
